scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); if (!fs.existsSync('public')) fs.mkdirSync('public', { recursive: true }); const workerPath = path.join('node_modules', 'pdfjs-dist', 'build', 'pdf.worker.min.mjs'); const destPath = path.join('public', 'pdf.worker.min.js'); if (fs.existsSync(workerPath)) fs.copyFileSync(workerPath, destPath);"
scripts.build: cd ../../packages/ui && pnpm run build && cd ../../apps/applications && next build
